TopicTitle: [support] Time warp level / focus etc messages not visible

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.3.1 x64 (b01891)

What Happens: Occasionally all of the

  • Time warp level
  • Focus object
  • Camera view (AUTO/LOCKED etc)
  • Target
  • etc

messages which normally appear below the altimeter are absent from the GUI

This is across all scenes, flight, KSC etc

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

I managed to experience this issue just from running the first couple of minutes of the 'From the Mun' tutorial a couple of times, and playing normally using a combination of regular time warp and forced physics warp under acceleration.

The issue is by no means unique to this tutorial though, I've experienced it dozens of times in career save.

Fixes/Workarounds:

Sometimes reloading various quicksaves will get the messages to reappear, but the only reliable fix is restarting the process.

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

Attached is a short log file where the issue happened during the 'From the Mun' tutorial:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6bqz0fgi76yiaoj/KSP.log?dl=0

The issue occurred during the second run of the tutorial ( from line 2973 on)

If I am just stupidly hitting some hotkey that hides these messages let me know! But I couldn't find any such thing from google

 

Edited October 29, 2017 by ravensierra
